Tolkien-related events that took place in 1983.

content.title: January
content.content:
17 - Mr. Bliss is published in the US.
17 - Actor Ryan Gage is born.
20 - Finn and Hengest is published in the UK.

content.title: March
content.content:
3 - The Monsters and the Critics is published in the UK.
5 - Actor Owain Arthur is born.
? - Southern Mirkwood is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
? - Finn and Hengest is published in the US.
? - Amon Hen 61 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
3 - Daphne Castell dies.
12-15 - Mythcon 14.
? - Amon Hen 63 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
7 - Actress Hannah Wood is born.
27 - The Book of Lost Tales: Part One is published in the UK.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - Actor Michael Spice dies.
15 - Actor John Le Mesurier dies.
15 - Illustrator Eric Fraser dies.

? - Splintered Light by Verlyn Flieger is published.
